snippet: An international arbitration panel says that Venezuela must pay Exxon Mobil for assets it nationalized in the Orinoco Belt, a region rich with heavy oil deposits.
abstract: International arbitration panel rules that Venezuela must pay Exxon Mobil more than $900 million for assets it nationalized in the Orinoco Belt, a region rich with heavy oil deposits.
lead_paragraph: An international arbitration panel says that Venezuela must pay Exxon Mobil for assets it nationalized in the Orinoco Belt, a region rich with heavy oil deposits.

headline.seo: Venezuela Ordered to Pay $900 Million to Exxon Mobil
headline.main: Venezuela Is Ordered to Pay $900 Million to Exxon Mobil
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Is Ordered to Pay $900 Million to Exxon Mobil
